snippet: A 25-year-old man was killed and three others were injured Sunday afternoon at a basketball court.
abstract: Harlem man is killed and three others injured in a shooting at a basketball court near 129th Street and Seventh Avenue.
lead_paragraph: A 25-year-old man was killed and three others were injured Sunday afternoon at a basketball court.

headline.seo: One Man Is Killed and 3 Others Are Injured in Harlem Shooting
headline.main: Harlem Shooting Kills One Man, Injures 3 Others
headline.print_headline: Harlem Shooting Kills One Man, Injures 3 Others
